Package org.freehep.record.source

Interface Summary
AsynchronousRecordSource A mixin interface that can be implemented by RecordSource's.
InteractiveRecordSource Some methods useful when a record source is used in an interactive environment.
RandomAccessRecordSource A record source which (efficiently) supports random access.
RecordReadyListener  
RecordTag A tag that identifies records in a TaggedRecordSet.
SequentialRecordSource The base interface that all record sources must implement.
TaggedRecordSource A record source which allows access to records by record tags.
 

Class Summary
RecordReadyEvent  
 

Exception Summary
EndOfSourceException An exception thrown when attempting to access a record beyong the end of a source.
NoSuchRecordException An exception thrown when attempting to access a record that does not exist.
